title: AI Engineer
bio: Devon Streelman is an AI Engineer at e360, where he develops AI solutions for organizations including the Los Angeles Angels, Capital Group, and Ross Dress for Less. With a background in automation and a degree in Computer Science from UC Davis, specializing in AI and machine learning, Devon is deeply engaged in vibe coding and AI-assisted development. Heâ€™s passionate about exploring tools and workflows that help teams get more done, faster.
